healthManagement.title: Health Management
healthManagement.description: Track and manage your health records, medications, and more.

reminders.description: Get notified about upcoming appointments and medication schedules.

healthTrends.description: Visualize your health data and trends.

medicationAlerts.description: Receive alerts for medication refills and doses.

reportSharing.title: Report Sharing
reportSharing.description: Easily share your health reports with doctors or family.

feedback.title: Share Your Thoughts
feedback.description: What features would you like to see in MediScan? Your feedback helps us prioritize future development.
